channel.title: Amg, Hard Summer Program :(
channel.description:
I don't even have any free time this whole summer until August 08!
I have to do this summer program (because I'm smart) to help meh get into a good boarding school (The best kind of school. It's true. And fun :))
I get up at 6:00 AM... Then I leave my house at 7:00 AM... And I take the bus to the subway and take the subway from Queens to Manhattan and then take the bus to the school. Which takes all about 1:30 :(
So when I get there its 8:30 then classes start at 9:00.
And classes end at 5:15...
And I just did my homework. Got home at 7:30 because of damn rush hour and took me until 11:00 PM to finish homework. And this was first day! It's gonna be much harder.
ahahahahaahahhahahaahahahaha whoooooopeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee

item.title: Amg, Hard Summer Program :(
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

anetp64:

And what I’m really looking forward to is no parents, girls, and free nights out on the weekend if you know what I mean.

No girls, free nights out on the weekend if you know what I mean?

No, I really don’t know what you mean unless you’re gay.

Read full topic

item.title: Amg, Hard Summer Program :(
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I never study or anything. I studied for one of my exams this year though, seeing as I was failing horribly. I passed of course I never really try in school. I’ll do the bare minimum to end up with a 50, and still end up with a 75 or something lol.

My summer is easy. I basically gotta find a decent job out west… but until then I will just get high a lot, party a lot, and sit around and do nothing a lot.

Read full topic

item.title: Amg, Hard Summer Program :(
item.dc:creator: @Stork Stork
item.description:
@Stork wrote:

Sucks to be you brah.

I personally do jack shit in the way of studying. Literally did like four pieces of work outside of college last year. And I have a place in one of the best universities in Britain, doing one of their strongest courses.

It’s good to be a stork.

Read full topic

item.title: Amg, Hard Summer Program :(
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Googling told me neither are the best in the world.

Don’t lie. You’d be surprised how many people here are educated in extremely well known and top quality institutions.

America alone isn’t home to the world’s best universities/schools or colleges.

I looked up your academy and it looks like an incredibly expensive place to spend your summer.

They claim to teach morals and other pleasantries, so fuck knows why the kid who posts hacked accounts is going.

Read full topic

item.title: Amg, Hard Summer Program :(
item.dc:creator: @anetp64 anetp64
item.description:
@anetp64 wrote:

Are you fucking kidding me? Google milton academy.

I’m going to a Massachusetts school (the best in the world…) Also I’m going to a boarding school. (Once again, the best in the world)

And what I’m really looking forward to is no parents, girls, and free nights out on the weekend if you know what I mean.

I’m going into 8th grade so I still have another year. And screw New York

Read full topic

item.description:
@Larenzo wrote:

Rofl… Just go to regular highschool? like a regular newyorker? I didn’t even know there was a boarding school in Newyork, and i live here.

I totally agree with Greeny
